# File lib/ramaze/contrib/sequel/form_field.rb, line 55
  def select(gestalt)
    gestalt.select @args do
      v = value.to_s
      hint.each do |h|
        h = h.to_s
        if h == v
          gestalt.option(:value => h, :selected => :selected){ h }
        else
          gestalt.option(:value => h){ h }
        end
      end
    end
  end
